channel.title: Hrishikesh S Namputiri
channel.description: Recent content on Hrishikesh S Namputiri

item.title: ICPC Journey Starts
item.description: Tommorrow is the start of my fully fledged ICPC training. This blog is for updating what I did everyday for ICPC training.

item.title: How did I made the website
item.description: 1) Install Hugo Link to heading sudo pacman -S hugo 2) Create two repo named .github.io and blog Link to heading 3) Clone these two repositories, make a README.md in .github.io and make an initial commit and push. Link to heading 4) Create a hugo site in blog repo. Download the theme you want from hugo themes website and move it to themes directory of the hugo site. Link to heading 5) In hugo.

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Hrishikesh S Namputiri, a first year student persuing B.Tech in Robotics and Artificial Intelligence in Amrita Viswa Vidyapeetham, Amritapuri. I am a linux nerd and I love programming. This is my first protfolio website and I think it looking is pretty good.
